subject: Comments disabled on junit.org
msgSnippet: ... From: Ben Rady  Date: Wed, Feb 4, 2009 at 10:43 AM Subject: Re: [junit] JUnit source hosting has moved to Github To: David Saff
messageBody:
---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: Ben Rady <benrady@...>
Date: Wed, Feb 4, 2009 at 10:43 AM
Subject: Re: [junit] JUnit source hosting has moved to Github
To: David Saff <david@...>


Comments are disabled for now. I'll look into how we can
1) Clean up the existing comments
2) Prevent future comment spam.

Thankfully, the forums still appear to be clean.

Ben
